sources.title: Mee-Shee: The Water Giant | FULL MOVIE | Family Fantasy Adventure
sources.description:
While traveling with his father, fun-loving 9-year-old Mac stumbles upon the hiding place of Mee-Shee, a lovable water giant, at a remote Canadian lake. Starring Bruce Greenwood.

#movie #comedy #scifi #familymovies #friendly #humor #lake #father #son #travel #monster #giantmonster #giant #canada #family

While traveling with his father, fun-loving 9-year-old Mac stumbles upon the hiding place of Mee-Shee, a lovable water giant, at a remote Canadian lake. Starring Bruce Greenwood.

metadata.Plot: A New York City oil company troubleshooter is brought to a remote B.C. lake to look for some lost machinery. Cancelling a trip to Disney World with his son, he decides to bring the boy along. They both end up experiencing more excitement than Mickey could ever conjure in Orlando, when they meet up with bad guys and a legendary creature.
metadata.Actors: Bruce Greenwood, Danny Mags, Rena Owen
